'''Marmadas Brandybuck''' was a [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] of [[the Shire]].

==History==
Marmadas was the son of [[Gorbulas Brandybuck]]. His three children were [[Merimas Brandybuck|Merimas]], [[Mentha Brandybuck|Mentha]] and [[Melilot Brandybuck|Melilot]]. He and his children attended [[Bilbo's Farewell Party]].<ref>{{App|Brandybuck}}</ref>

==Etymology==
The meaning of the name ''Marmadas'' is unknown. [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] noted that the names of the Bucklanders had a vaguely [[Celtic]] style.<ref name="Translation">{{App|Translation}}, p. 1135</ref>

[[Jim Allan]] suggests that the name ''Marmadas'' is a varation of the name ''[[Marmadoc Brandybuck|Marmadoc]]'' with the ending ''-as'' like in in the names ''[[Merimas Brandybuck|Merimas]]'' and ''[[Saradas Brandybuck|Saradas]]''.<ref>{{HM|IE}}, "Giving of Names", p. 203</ref>
